weekly picks (Nov 2 week 2022)

Posted on November 7, 2022 in 2022nov,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2022 Nov 2nd week collection

  1. 2211.04035 Quantum metallic state in the titanium sesquioxide heterointerface superconductor (arXiv)

  2. 2211.04102 Hall Effect in Doped Mott - Hubbard Insulator (arXiv)

  3. 2211.04216 Charge fluctuations above $T_\mathrm{CDW}$ revealed by glasslike thermal transport in kagome metals $A$V$_3$Sb$_5$ ($A$ = K, Rb, Cs) (kagome phonon glass, arXiv)

  4. 2211.04334 Universal features of entanglement entropy in the honeycomb Hubbard model (arXiv)

  5. 2211.02663 Quantum noise spectroscopy of dynamical critical phenomena (arXiv)

  6. 2211.02668 Interplay of superconductivity and localization near a 2D ferromagnetic quantum critical point (arXiv)

  7. 2211.02693 Kekule spiral order in magic-angle graphene: a density matrix renormalization group study (graphene, arXiv)

  8. 2211.03198 Gauge Equivariant Neural Networks for 2+1D U(1) Gauge Theory Simulations in Hamiltonian Formulation (arXiv)

  9. 2211.03412 Optical studies of structural phase transition in the vanadium-based kagome metal ScV6Sn6 (kagome, arXiv)

  10. 2211.03654 Magnetic excitations, phase diagram and order-by-disorder in the extended triangular-lattice Hubbard model (arXiv)

  11. 2211.03737 Non-Kitaev vs. Kitaev Honeycomb Cobaltates (Kee, arXiv)

  12. 2211.02880 Superconductivity and correlated phases in bilayer, trilayer graphene and related structures (FGuinea, arXiv)

  13. 2211.03075 Prediction of superconducting properties of materials based on machine learning models (Cr2CuO4, arXiv)

  14. 2211.03083 T-linear resistivity in the strange-metal phase of cuprate superconductors due to umklapp scattering from a spin excitation (T-linear, arXiv)

  15. 2211.03265 Machine-learning approach for discovery of conventional superconductors (arXiv)

  16. PhysRevB.106.195113 Anomalous Hall conductivity control in ${\mathrm{Mn}}_{3}\mathrm{NiN}$ antiperovskite by epitaxial strain along the kagome plane (PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.106.195114 Unconventional magnetoresistance and electronic transition in ${\mathrm{Mn}}_{3}\mathrm{Ge}$ Weyl semimetal (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.195115 Tunable interface states between Floquet-Weyl semimetals (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.205109 Simultaneous formation of two-fold rotation symmetry with charge order in the kagome superconductor ${\mathrm{CsV}}{3}{\mathrm{Sb}}{5}$ by optical polarization rotation measurement (kagome, PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.106.205110 Theory of charge and spin pumping in atomic-scale spiral magnets (Nagaosa, PRB)

  21. PhysRevB.106.205111 Topological properties of subsystem-symmetry-protected edge states in an extended quasi-one-dimensional dimerized lattice (PRB)

  22. 2211.02361 Pressure-induced structural transition and new superconducting phase in UTe2 (arXiv)

  23. 2211.02492 Multilayer graphenes as a platform for interaction-driven physics and topological superconductivity (arXiv)

  24. 2211.02564 In-plane anisotropy of electrical transport in Y${0.85}$Tb${0.15}$Ba$2$Cu$_3$O${7-x}$ films (arXiv)

  25. 2211.02649 Polar hairs of mixed-parity nodal superconductors in Rarita-Schwinger-Weyl metals (arXiv)

  26. 2211.02071 Magnetic quantum phase transition in a metallic Kondo heterostructure (arXiv)

  27. 2211.02153 Spin-orbit and exchange proximity couplings in graphene/1T-TaS$_2$ heterostructure triggered by a charge density wave (graphene CDW, arXiv)

  28. 2211.02306 Quantized thermoelectric Hall plateau in the quantum limit of graphite as a nodal line semimetal (arXiv)
